summary.purpose: Defines TypeScript types and interfaces for Firebase Firestore operations including document queries, snapshot subscriptions, and bulk snapshot management.
summary.problem_solved: Provides strongly typed function signatures and configuration interfaces for Firestore queries (single and multiple documents, conditional queries) and real-time snapshot listeners with support for add/modify/remove callbacks, Redis or Firebase subscription modes, bulk initialization, and debug options.

symbols.name: QueryDocuments
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for querying multiple Firestore documents matching a single where condition.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that queries a Firestore collection by a single field condition (field_name, operator, value) and returns a promise resolving to an array of TObject<any> documents.

symbols.name: WhereCondition
symbols.description_one_line: Type representing a single Firestore where clause with field name, operator, and value.

details.what_it_does: Defines the shape of a Firestore where condition with field_name (string), operator (FirebaseFirestore.WhereFilterOp), and value (any). Used to build query conditions for Firestore queries.

symbols.name: QueryDocumentsByConditions
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for querying multiple Firestore documents using an array of where conditions.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that queries a Firestore collection path with multiple WhereCondition filters and returns a promise resolving to an array of TObject<any> documents.

symbols.name: QueryDocumentByConditions
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for querying a single Firestore document using multiple where conditions.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that queries a Firestore collection with multiple WhereCondition filters and an optional log flag, returning a promise resolving to a single TObject<any> document.

symbols.name: QueryDocument
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for querying a single Firestore document by a single where condition.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that queries a Firestore collection by a single field condition (field_name, operator, value) with an optional ignore_log flag, returning a promise resolving to a single TObject<any> document.

symbols.name: QueryDocumentOptional
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for querying a single Firestore document that may not exist, returning null if not found.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type similar to QueryDocument but returns `TObject<any> | null`, allowing callers to handle the case where no matching document exists without throwing an error.

symbols.name: OnSnapshotCallback
symbols.description_one_line: Callback function type invoked when snapshot changes occur.

details.what_it_does: Defines a callback function type that receives an array of documents and an OnSnapshotConfig configuration object. Invoked during snapshot lifecycle events (first load, add, modify, remove).

symbols.name: OnSnapshotParsers
symbols.description_one_line: Interface defining optional callback handlers for different snapshot change types.

details.what_it_does: Groups optional OnSnapshotCallback handlers for four snapshot lifecycle events: on_first_time (initial data load), on_add (new document added), on_modify (existing document changed), and on_remove (document deleted).

symbols.name: ExtraSnapshotConfig
symbols.description_one_line: Interface for extended snapshot configuration beyond basic parsers.

details.what_it_does: Defines additional snapshot configuration including collection_name, extra_parsers (array of OnSnapshotParsers), where conditions for filtering, cache_name for Redis caching, parse_as mode ('object' or 'array'), doc_key_property for object key selection, subscription_type ('redis' or 'firebase'), and debug options with granular control per event type.

symbols.name: OnSnapshotConfig
symbols.description_one_line: Combined type merging snapshot parser callbacks with extended snapshot configuration.

details.what_it_does: Creates an intersection type of OnSnapshotParsers and ExtraSnapshotConfig, combining the lifecycle callback handlers with the extended configuration options into a single configuration type for snapshot listeners.

symbols.name: Snapshot
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for initializing a single Firestore snapshot listener.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that accepts an OnSnapshotConfig and returns a Promise<void>, used to start a real-time snapshot listener on a Firestore collection.

symbols.name: SnapshotBulk
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for initializing multiple snapshot listeners concurrently with an optional label.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that accepts an array of Snapshot return values (promises) and an optional label string, executing all snapshot initializations concurrently and returning a Promise<void>.

symbols.name: SnapshotBulkByNamesParamObject
symbols.description_one_line: Object parameter type for SnapshotBulkByNames with required extra_parsers and omitted default parsers.

details.what_it_does: Extends ExtraSnapshotConfig (omitting 'extra_parsers') with a required 'extra_parsers' field (array of OnSnapshotParsers). Used when passing detailed configuration objects to SnapshotBulkByNames.

symbols.name: SnapshotBulkByNamesParam
symbols.description_one_line: Union type allowing either a collection name string or a detailed SnapshotBulkByNamesParamObject.

details.what_it_does: Defines a union type of string | SnapshotBulkByNamesParamObject, allowing callers to specify snapshot targets either as simple collection name strings or as detailed configuration objects.

symbols.name: SnapshotBulkByNamesOptions
symbols.description_one_line: Options type for SnapshotBulkByNames with shared debug, subscription, parse, and label settings.

details.what_it_does: Picks 'debug', 'subscription_type', 'parse_as', and 'doc_key_property' from ExtraSnapshotConfig and adds an optional 'label' string, providing shared configuration options that apply to all snapshots in a bulk-by-names operation.

symbols.name: SnapshotBulkByNames
symbols.description_one_line: Function type for initializing multiple snapshot listeners by collection names or config objects.

details.what_it_does: Defines an async function type that accepts an array of SnapshotBulkByNamesParam (strings or config objects) and optional SnapshotBulkByNamesOptions, initializing snapshot listeners for each and returning a Promise<void>.

symbols.name: InitSnapshotsOptions
symbols.description_one_line: Interface for snapshot initialization options picking subscription_type and debug from ExtraSnapshotConfig.

details.what_it_does: Extends Pick<ExtraSnapshotConfig, 'subscription_type' | 'debug'> to provide a focused options interface for initializing the snapshot system, allowing callers to specify the subscription mode (redis or firebase) and debug settings.
